    • Constructor Detail

      • FilterSettings

        public FilterSettings(org.json.JSONObject source)
               throws org.json.JSONException
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException

      • FilterSettings

        public FilterSettings(boolean doFilter,
                      FilterSettings.UpperFrequency upperFrequency,
                      PowerFrequency rejectionFilterFrequency,
                      int rejFilterQ)
        primary used constructor
        Parameters:
        doFilter - set to true to enable filters
        upperFrequency - upper frequency for Low Pass filter
        rejectionFilterFrequency - Band-rejection filter is used to remove power line pickup. Set band-rejection filter to 50 or 60 Hz according to powerline frequency used in area where the scan takes place.
        rejFilterQ - band-rejection filter quality. Between 24 and 100.

      • FilterSettings

        public FilterSettings(PowerFrequency rejectionFilterFrequency,
                      FilterSettings source)
